issue.title: [CI][Python] Building GCS with conda fails due to python 3.11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

this seems to be due to the command:
```java

RUN mamba install -q -y --file arrow/ci/conda_env_cpp.txt --file arrow/ci/conda_env_gandiva.txt compilers doxygen valgrind && mamba clean --all 
```
installing the latest Python 3.11:
```java

17.78 + python 3.11.0 h582c2e5_0_cpython conda-forge/linux-64 38MB 
```
<font color="#1d1c1d">Example of job failure: </font><https://github.com/apache/arrow/actions/runs/3319519611/jobs/5484773342>
